projects.title: Island House
projects.details: This repos leads to a website I designed and developed for a client. It is your standard multipage website created with HTML5, SCSS, JavaScript and a bit of jQuery. It was an excellent learning oppertunity and the client loved it.

projects.title: React Calculator
projects.details: This is a fun little calculator created with React. I had not appreacated how neuance creating one can be. It was a very fun experience.

projects.title: Game of Life
projects.details: This is Conway's Game of Life created in pure JavaScript and Canvas. It's suprisingly addictive to watch.

projects.title: Project Euler
projects.details: This repo is part of an on going project I have been doing with the WB boys. We are focusing on learning more mathematics while also completing Project Euler challanges. I have personally decided to code it in C++ to improve my lower level programming skills.

projects.title: Margaux Gallery
projects.details: This is a gallery website I made using Vue.js and Vuetify. I can't emphasise enough how pleanet working with Vue is. For the database I used Firebase which is also a very user friendly noSql database. I sadly had to bring the website down for now due to a range of dependency vualnerablities.

projects.title: Clear View
projects.details: This is one of the first websites I ever made using HTML/CSS/JS. It's a mock travel website. The leve of nostalgia here is unreal

projects.title: Old Website
projects.details: This was my first attempt at making a personal website. I ended up not liking the desgin at the end and decided to bring it down.

projects.title: Lifespan Counter
projects.details: This was a little counter app I made the calculates a person's remaining lifespan. I used Vue.js and plain CSS and it turned out rather nice.
